722988f-a.folder: Rivington Street & Suffolk Street, Manhattan, NY
722988f-a.text:
Rivington Street, north side, west from Suffolk St., showing a cleared site at the corner surrounded by tenements. Views 2 and 3 are limited to this feature, where formerly stood two tenements that bore No's. 146 and 144 Rivington St.

View 1 May 12, 1939

P. L. Sperr

Views 2 and 3: 1937
Committee on Housing
Charity Organization Society

723455f-a.folder: Suffolk Street & Rivington Street, Manhattan, NY
723455f-a.text:
122-118 Suffolk Street, at, adjoining and south of the S.E. corner of Rivington Street. Also shown is Rivington Street, at and adjoining the S.E. corner of Suffolk Street.

About 1915.
